newsitem.title: MOROCCO: Moroccan c.bank injects 200 mln dirhams at auction.
newsitem.headline: Moroccan c.bank injects 200 mln dirhams at auction.

text.p: The Moroccan Bank al-Maghrib (central bank) injected 200 million dirhams in the money market for one week at its repurchase auction on Wednesday, a bank official said.
The bank said it received bids totalling 9.098 billion dirhams and allocated 2.700 billion dirhams at seven-percent interest rate for one week.
The amount allocated was less than 2.500 billion dirhams leaving the market this week, it said.
The bank satisfied 29.67 percent of demand.
The next auction will be on September 18, 1996.
